channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa has been dumped, 8th April
item.description:
Someone has dumped an old sofa in the lay by on the right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy drain cover in road when traffic goes over it, 8th April
item.description:
There is a drain cover outside our house in the road (100priros road) It has become loose and everytime a car is driving over itâ€™s a really loud bang we have heavy traffic constantly and even at night which. Is causing a lot of disturbance and disruption It is even waking us in the night and early hours of the morning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 102 Priors Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Compacted and slippery leaves, 7th April
item.description:
This stretch of footpath does not appear to have been swept/cleaned since the autumn. The dead leaves have piled up quite deep and are very mushy and slippery when wet and are fairly compacted, now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 89 Andover Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unavoidable deep pothole, 7th April
item.description:
Deep and dangerous on a corner road is only just wide enough for 2 cars so trying to go round it is very risky with it being on a corner and opposite a junction accident waiting to happen plus a few bent wheels and flat tyres!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Hayden Lane, Hayden
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of litter of the verges, 6th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Churchdown

item.title: Significant Road / Bus Bay Damage, 4th April
item.description:
